dict.string: Shut Up is a general-purpose comment blocker for Safari.
Permanently denying this connection will gradually degrade Shut Up's comment blocking as websites are redesigned.

Websites get updated and redesigned constantly. To maintain effective comment blocking, Shut Up uses [a stylesheet on my server](https://rickyromero.com/shutup/updates/shutup.css) to block comments. It checks this file for updates every 2 days. [Shut Up doesn't track you](https://rickyromero.com/shutup/privacy/), and my server doesn't log IP addresses.
